control_attributes.Control: SC-31 (3) MEASURE BANDWIDTH IN OPERATIONAL ENVIRONMENTS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization measures the bandwidth of [Assignment: organization-defined subset of identified covert channels] in the operational environment of the information system.
